bt.torrent

Interface TorrentRegistry

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdhocTorrentRegistry

    public interface TorrentRegistry
    Registry of all torrents known to the current runtime.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<TorrentDescriptor> getDescriptor(Torrent torrent)
      Deprecated. 
      since 1.3 in favor of getDescriptor(TorrentId)
      Optional<TorrentDescriptor> getDescriptor(TorrentId torrentId)
      Get a torrent descriptor for a given torrent, if exists.
      TorrentDescriptor getOrCreateDescriptor(Torrent torrent, Storage storage)
      Deprecated. 
      since 1.3 in favor of more clearly named register(Torrent, Storage)
      Optional<Torrent> getTorrent(TorrentId torrentId)
      Get a torrent with a given torrent ID, if exists.
      Collection<TorrentId> getTorrentIds()
      Get all torrents, that have been registered in the runtime.
      Collection<Torrent> getTorrents()
      Get all torrents, that have been registered in the runtime.
      TorrentDescriptor register(TorrentId torrentId)
      Get an existing torrent descriptor for a given torrent ID or create a new one if it does not exist.
      TorrentDescriptor register(Torrent torrent, Storage storage)
      Get an existing torrent descriptor for a given torrent or create a new one if it does not exist.

    • Method Detail

      • getTorrents

        Collection<Torrent> getTorrents()
        Get all torrents, that have been registered in the runtime.
        Returns:
        All registered torrents
        Since:
        1.2

      • getTorrentIds

        Collection<TorrentId> getTorrentIds()
        Get all torrents, that have been registered in the runtime.
        Returns:
        All registered torrents
        Since:
        1.3

      • getTorrent

        Optional<Torrent> getTorrent(TorrentId torrentId)
        Get a torrent with a given torrent ID, if exists.
        Returns:
        Optional.empty() if this torrent ID is not known to the current runtime.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getDescriptor

        Optional<TorrentDescriptor> getDescriptor(Torrent torrent)
        Deprecated. since 1.3 in favor of getDescriptor(TorrentId)
        Get a torrent descriptor for a given torrent, if exists.
        Returns:
        Optional.empty() if torrent descriptor hasn't been created yet.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getDescriptor

        Optional<TorrentDescriptor> getDescriptor(TorrentId torrentId)
        Get a torrent descriptor for a given torrent, if exists.
        Returns:
        Optional.empty() if torrent descriptor hasn't been created yet.
        Since:
        1.3

      • getOrCreateDescriptor

        TorrentDescriptor getOrCreateDescriptor(Torrent torrent,
                                        Storage storage)
        Deprecated. since 1.3 in favor of more clearly named register(Torrent, Storage)
        Get an existing torrent descriptor for a given torrent or create a new one if it does not exist.
        Parameters:
        storage - Storage to use for storing this torrent's files. Will be used when creating a new torrent descriptor.
        Returns:
        Torrent descriptor
        Since:
        1.0

      • register

        TorrentDescriptor register(Torrent torrent,
                           Storage storage)
        Get an existing torrent descriptor for a given torrent or create a new one if it does not exist.
        Parameters:
        storage - Storage to use for storing this torrent's files. Will be used when creating a new torrent descriptor.
        Returns:
        Torrent descriptor
        Since:
        1.3

      • register

        TorrentDescriptor register(TorrentId torrentId)
        Get an existing torrent descriptor for a given torrent ID or create a new one if it does not exist.
        Returns:

        Since:
        1.3
